TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapDataSource extends System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl implements class System.ComponentModel.IListSource, class System.Web.UI.IDataSource
Public Class SiteMapDataSource Inherits HierarchicalDataSourceControl Implements IDataSource, IListSource
public ref class SiteMapDataSource : System::Web::UI::HierarchicalDataSourceControl, System::ComponentModel::IListSource, System::Web::UI::IDataSource
type SiteMapDataSource = class inherit HierarchicalDataSourceControl interface IDataSource interface IListSource

summary.span: Provides a data source control that Web server controls and other controls can use to bind to hierarchical site map data.

span.span: Provides a data source control that Web server controls and other controls can use to bind to hierarchical site map data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [指定的起始节点Specifying the Starting Node](#specifying_the_starting_node) - [检索站点地图数据Retrieving Site Map Data](#retrieving_site_map_data) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是到由站点地图提供程序，为您的网站配置存储的站点地图数据的数据源。The control is a data source to the site map data that is stored by the site map providers that are configured for your site. 使 Web 服务器控件不是专门站点导航控件，如， ，和控件，可以绑定到分层站点地图数据。The enables Web server controls that are not specifically site navigation controls, such as the , , and controls, to bind to hierarchical site map data. 内容采用表格式显示站点地图或主动在网站内导航，可以使用这些 Web 服务器控件。You can use these Web server controls to display a site map as a table of contents or to actively navigate a site. 或者，可以使用控件，它专门设计为站点导航控件，因此不需要的实例控件。Alternatively, you can use the control, which is designed specifically as a site navigation control and therefore does not need an instance of the control. ## 指定的起始节点Specifying the Starting Node 将绑定到站点地图数据并显示其视图基于站点地图层次结构中的指定起始节点。The binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy. 默认情况下，它是层次结构的根节点，但它还可在层次结构中的任何节点。By default, it is the root node of the hierarchy but it can also be any node within the hierarchy. 起始节点由多个值属性，如下所示：The starting node is identified by the values of several properties as follows: |起始节点Starting Node|属性值Property Values| |-------------------|---------------------| |层次结构 （默认设置） 的根节点。The root node of the hierarchy (the default setting).| 为 `false`。The is `false`.

未设置 。The is not set.| |表示当前正在查看的页的节点。The node that represents the currently viewed page.| 为 `true`。The is `true`.

未设置 。The is not set.| |层次结构的特定节点。A specific node of the hierarchy.| 为 `false`。The is `false`.

设置。The is set.| 如果属性设置为 0 以外的值，它会影响起始节点并与其站点将映射的公开数据层次结构控件。If the property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the control. 负值或正值的整数值标识的向上或向下的站点映射层次结构从起始节点由标识的级别数和偏移起始节点的子树的属性数据源控件所公开的。The negative or positive integer value of the identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the and properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control. 如果属性设置为一个负数 *-n*，数据源控件所公开的子树的起始节点是祖先节点*n*上面标识层次结构级别正在启动节点。If the property is set to a negative number *-n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node. 如果该值*n*大于在层次结构树中，子树的起始节点的上级级别数是站点地图层次结构的根节点。If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy. 如果属性设置为正数 +*n*，公开的子树的起始节点是一个子节点*n*下标识的起始节点的级别。If the property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node. 因为层次结构中可能存在的子节点的多个分支尝试解析直接在所标识的起始节点和表示当前请求页上，如有可能的节点之间的路径上的子节点。Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible. 表示当前请求的页的节点不是标识起始节点的值的子树中属性将被忽略。If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the property is ignored. 表示当前请求的页的节点是否小于*n*标识起始节点的当前请求的页节点下的级别用作起始节点。If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node. ## 检索站点地图数据Retrieving Site Map Data 从检索站点地图数据对象，例如，这是 ASP.NET 的默认站点映射提供程序。Site map data is retrieved from an object, such as , which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET. 可以指定配置为您的网站来提供站点的数据映射到任何提供程序可以通过访问获取可用的提供程序列表和集合。You can specify any provider that is configured for your site to provide the site map data to the and can obtain the list of available providers by accessing the collection. 所有数据源控件、 的每个实例等与单一的帮助程序对象，称为数据源视图相关联。Like all data source controls, every instance of a is associated with a single helper object, known as a data source view. 根据数据源的属性是在站点地图数据的视图，通过调用检索方法。The is a view on the site map data, according to the properties of the data source, and is retrieved by calling the method. 维护控件绑定到的对象。The maintains the object that the controls bind to. 默认情况下，起始节点在层次结构的根节点，但可以将起始节点设置为任何节点。By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node. 起始点可以是相对于当前的位置中的站点映射或绝对位置的节点。The starting point can be a node that is relative to the current position in the site map or to an absolute position. 可以通过设置指定的起始节点属性。You can specify the starting node by setting the property. 专用于导航数据并不支持常见的数据源操作，例如排序、 筛选、 分页、 缓存，或数据记录的操作，例如更新、 插入或删除。The is specialized for navigation data, and does not support common data source operations such as sorting, filtering, paging, caching, or data record operations such as updates, insertions or deletions. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将绑定控件的站点映射使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to a site map using a control. 在根节点级别开始检索站点地图数据。The site map data is retrieved beginning at the root node level. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1/CS/webform1smdscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1/VB/webform1smdsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Retrieves a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

span.span: Retrieves a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

returns.span: An of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

span.span: An of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索一组可用作源的对象控件。Use the method to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources for the control. 站点地图数据源控件将数据作为其列表封装对象。Site map data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects. 因此，与一个或多个关联时会对象，控件表示列表的源对象和方法返回包含一个元素的列表-的数据源控件本身。Therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the method returns a list containing one element — the data source control itself. 方法调用静态方法来检索可作为数据源的对象的列表。The method calls the static method to retrieve a list of objects that can be used as sources of data. 检查是否方法将返回有效的视图名称集合。The checks whether the method returns a valid collection of view names. 如果是这样，返回包含一个元素的列表- 。If it does, the returns a list containing one element — the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对调用期间计算属性和时填充这些方法返回的节点树的方法。The property is evaluated during calls to the and methods, when the node tree that is returned by these methods is populated. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the site map provider that the data source binds to.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the site map provider that the data source binds to.

value.span: 站点地图提供程序的名称，将绑定到。

span.span: The name of the site map provider that the binds to.

value.span: 默认情况下的值是，并使用该站点的默认站点映射提供程序。

span.span: By default, the value is , and the default site map provider for the site is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将绑定到提供的站点地图数据的控件对象而非默认的提供程序。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to site map data that is provided by an object other than the default provider. Web.config 文件所做的自定义对象提供给`SiteMapDataSource`控件：The Web.config file makes a custom object available to the `SiteMapDataSource` control: ``` ``` 代码`SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`此 Web.config 文件示例引用的类可在类概述。The code for the `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` class that this Web.config file example references can be found in the class overview. 如果使用 Visual Basic 示例，该命名空间以"VB"而不是"CS"结尾。If you use the Visual Basic example, the namespace ends in "VB" instead of "CS". 此外可以为"text.txt"站点地图文件中查找示例内容类概述。You can also find sample content for the "text.txt" site map file in the class overview. > [!NOTE] > `AsciiTextProvider`不是默认的提供程序 （在本例中） 保持站点对象。The `AsciiTextProvider` is not the default provider for the site, which (in this case) remains the object. 的属性控件设置为自定义站点映射提供程序的名称和数据绑定到相应的站点映射。The property of the control is set to the name of a custom site map provider, and the binds to the corresponding site map data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3/CS/webform3smdscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3/VB/webform3smdsvb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 如果节点树检索相对于当前页;否则为。

span.span: if the node tree is retrieved relative to the current page; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对调用期间计算属性和方法，以帮助确定哪些站点地图节点要用作起始点生成的节点树。The property is evaluated during calls to the and the methods to help determine which site map node to use as a starting point to build the node tree. 和属性是互相排斥，如果您设置属性，确保属性是`false`。The and properties are mutually exclusive — if you set the property, ensure that the property is `false`. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

summary.span: Gets or sets a positive or negative integer offset from the starting node that determines the root hierarchy that is exposed by the data source control.

span.span: Gets or sets a positive or negative integer offset from the starting node that determines the root hierarchy that is exposed by the data source control.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示的根层次结构由起始节点相同。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that the root hierarchy exposed by the is the same as the starting node.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果属性设置为 0 以外的值，它会影响起始节点并与其站点将映射的公开数据层次结构控件。If the property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the control. 负值或正值的整数值标识的向上或向下的站点映射层次结构从起始节点由标识的级别数和偏移起始节点的子树的属性数据源控件所公开的。The negative or positive integer value of the identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the and properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control. 如果所标识的起始节点是表示当前请求的页的节点将被忽略。If the identified starting node is the node that represents the currently requested page, the is ignored. 如果属性设置为负数-*n*，数据源控件所公开的子树的起始节点是祖先节点*n*上面标识层次结构级别正在启动节点。If the property is set to a negative number -*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node. 如果该值*n*大于在层次结构树中，子树的起始节点的上级级别数是站点地图层次结构的根节点。If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy. 如果属性设置为正数 +*n*，公开的子树的起始节点是一个子节点*n*下标识的起始节点的级别。If the property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node. 因为层次结构中可能存在的子节点的多个分支尝试解析直接在所标识的起始节点和表示当前请求页上，如有可能的节点之间的路径上的子节点。Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible. 表示当前请求的页的节点不是标识起始节点的值的子树中属性将被忽略。If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the property is ignored. 表示当前请求的页的节点是否小于*n*标识起始节点的当前请求的页节点下的级别用作起始节点。If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了的效果和属性。The following code example demonstrates the effect of the and properties. 该示例包含多个 ASP.NET 页、 母版页、 母版页部分和 Web.sitemap 文件。The example consists of several ASP.NET pages, a master page, master page section, and a Web.sitemap file. Web.sitemap 文件中定义站点层次的结构。The Web.sitemap file defines the hierarchical structure of the site. 有关此代码示例，它定义了很多标识的唯一 Url，例如 1.aspx、 2.aspx、 A.aspx 和 B.aspx，按如下所示的页面：For this code example, it defines a number of pages identified by unique URLs, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and B.aspx, as follows: Site.master 页包含和一个中的控件控件。The Site.master page contains the and a controls inside a control. 它标识为 Default.aspx，公开的层次结构的起始节点使用属性。It identifies the starting node of the exposed hierarchy as Default.aspx, using the property. Default.aspx 页仅使用 Site.master 文件。The Site.master file is used by the Default.aspx page only. 所有其他页面，例如 1.aspx、 2.aspx、 A.aspx，以此类推，使用 Section.master 母版页。All other pages, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and so on, use the Section.master master page. 此母版页是非常类似于 Site.master 中，但它包含多个您可以尝试使用的控件。This master page is very similar to Site.master, however it contains several controls that you can experiment with. 控件，用于显示站点地图数据最初绑定到`SiteMapDataSource1`，它指定为 1。The control that displays site map data is initially bound to `SiteMapDataSource1`, which specifies a of 1. 这表示，显示当前请求页的父节点。This indicates that the parent node of the currently requested page is displayed. 如果您查看页面 1.aspx，通过显示层次结构为 A，1、 2。If you view page 1.aspx, the hierarchy displayed by the is A, 1, 2. 但是，如果您查看页面 4.aspx，层次结构是 B，3，4。However, if you view page 4.aspx, the hierarchy is B, 3, 4. 如果您更改有关到`SiteMapDataSource2`，则控件显示站点地图数据以不同的方式。If you change the for the to `SiteMapDataSource2`, the control displays site map data differently. 当你使用`SiteMapDataSource2`，则属性设置为`true`，这意味着，相对于当前请求页显示站点地图数据和属性设置为-1，指示一个级别的子节点显示，在可能的情况。When you use `SiteMapDataSource2`, the property is set to `true`, which means that the site map data is displayed relative to the currently requested page and the property is set to -1, indicating that one level of child nodes is displayed, when possible. 查看 A.aspx 页时，显示的层次结构是层次结构的当前级别，包括所有同级节点，如 B 和 c。当您查看 1.aspx 时，不再显示父节点。When you view the A.aspx page, the hierarchy that is displayed is the hierarchy of the current level, including all siblings, such as B and C. When you view 1.aspx, the parent nodes are no longer displayed. 下面的代码示例演示一个可以使用此代码示例的其他组件使用的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example demonstrates one of the ASP.NET pages you can use with the other components of this code example. ``` <%@ Page MasterPageFile="~/Section.master" Title="Untitled Page" %>

1.aspx

 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性绑定到站点地图数据并显示其视图基于站点地图层次结构中的指定起始节点。The property binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy. 默认情况下，起始节点为根节点的层次结构，但可以将起始节点设置为任何节点属性或一组属性设置为`true`。By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node with the property or set the property to `true`. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性和绑定控制对控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property and bind a control to a control.
